name: Surrealistic Style
description:
You play as a weird creature who exits its house in Winter for the first time during the COVID-19 pandemic to explore Spring.

Features:

  • Short
  • A cool and funny character named Assman
  • Cool soundtracks
  • Happy and funny 
  • Some parts might be a bit challenging for some players.

Controls:

Note: This game supports both keyboard and gamepad.

Move: A, D, Left arrow, Right arrow

Jump: Space, W, Up arrow 

Credits:

Created by Ali Saneei 

Tester: Behnam
